scenarios.description: You are a barista who has to tell a customer that their latte is actually a portal to another dimension.
You are a time-travelling tour guide explaining modern smartphones to someone from the 1800s.
You are a restaurant waiter who must calmly tell a customer that their order has escaped the kitchen.
You are a customer trying to return an obviously cursed object to a very skeptical shop owner.
You are a tech support person helping someone whose computer is possessed by a friendly ghost.
You are a real estate agent showing a house where gravity works differently in each room.
You are a therapist counseling a superhero who's afraid of their own superpowers.
You are a museum curator explaining why the paintings keep rearranging themselves at night.
You are a delivery driver explaining why the package is three years late.
You are a chef on a cooking show where all your ingredients are invisible.
